channel.title: Option to Save Games
channel.description:
Sometimes when I have amazing games, I want a way to save it even if I wasn't recording. It would be a nice feature for us to be able to save games and go back through what happened. Even just being able to download a txt file of everything that happened would be nice. I absolutely love the game by the way.
Thanks!

item.description:
I agree with this. Even just a text log of the chat box (including all visible messages to me, abilities/accusations/executes/etc) saved in some folder would be great.
